channel.title: feed on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in feed on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-25
item.description: Spotify tests a TikTok-like vertical video feed in its app (3 minute read) Spotify is currently testing a new vertical video feed feature called Discover.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-02
item.description: Google Maps takes on Facebook with launch of its own news feed (3 minute read) Google Maps has introduced its own news feed feature.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-24
item.description: Snapchat launches a TikTok-like feed called Spotlight, kick-started by paying creators (5 minute read) Spotlight is Snapchat’s new TikTok-like feed that lets users watch short, entertaining videos in a vertically scrollable video format.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-13
item.description: Chipotle to open its first digital-only restaurant as online orders soar (1 minute read) Chipotle Mexican Grill will open its first digital-only restaurant on Saturday.
